name: Infiltrate [A26]
description:
Infiltrate is a prototype game developed for a class assignment. 

In Infiltrate, you play as a highly-honoured soldier, Sargent Ryan, who has been given a critical task; Infiltrate the enemy camp and secure intelligence detrimental to winning the war.

Infiltrate is a race-against-time to secure the intelligence and escape, along the way you may pick up infiltry (grenades) to increase your time remaining but watch out for flame which will drain your time bank. Through the game there are optional collectible trophies which will give you a sizeable score boost, use these to try gain the highest score.
